1.content:
"Okay, Sonic. Reports say that Eggman and Metal Sonic were sighted near a strange portal." said Tails in the tornado.

"Portal? Are you sure about that?" said Knuckles.

"Sounds like a fun time for people on the go, which is me of course." said Sonic running toward the area.

"HOHOHO! My greatest plan is in action. My army is inside with Metal Sonic and I will rule the world." said Eggman.

"A world of morons?" said the hedgehog.

"Sonic?! What a perfect day. I get to conceur a new world and destroy Sonic. Egg Hawk, deploy."

Then a metallic hawk came down. Eggman walked inside and went through the portal saying,"Come and get me, hedgehog."

"Wann play tag? Fine by me."

He then hastely ran through the portal after Eggman.

"We better go after them, Knuckles."

"Sure, after all, we have to clean up the mess."

The tornado followed sonic with Tails and Knuckles abord.

What type of media do they travel to?
1.title: A chase threw many worlds

115321.content:
Team Sonic finally arrive at Metal Gear Solid 1.

Then Sonic said as he fell cold "Brrrrr. It's too cold here"

"Don't worry, Sonic. Here a coat for you to wear." said Tail to Sonic as he give Sonic a winter coat.

"Hey, guy. I saw someone move." said Knuckle to Sonic & Tails as point at.

As they look at someone & saw someone was.......
115321.title: MGS1

1153211.content:
A Genome soldier in a white winter uniform rounded the corner and spotted the the three mobians. He quickly raised his gun and flashed the light on his gun at them.

Genome Soldier: Freeze! Don't move!

Sonic, Tails and Knuckles stood there wondering what to do when they noticed a silhouette coming up behind the soldier. As he reached for his radio to report his find, he was suddenly put into a chokehold. The soldier flailed about, trying to break free. But a few seconds later, the Genome laid unconscious on the ground, with a man in a Sneaking Suit, military gear, and a bandana stood above him. Snake looked back over at Sonic and the others, and...
1153211.title: Solid Snake

choices: Snake allows them to tag along.
11532111.content:
Snake pulled his gun out and slowly approached the three. They stood there for a few seconds, until Snake broke the silence.

Snake: Who are you? More importantly, what are you?

Sonic: I'm Sonic the Hedgehog, this is Tails, and that's Knuckles. Who are you?

Snake:......Snake.....

Tails: What are you doing here?

Snake: Never mind about that. I'm just trying to get in.

Knuckles: *Cracks Knuckles* I can do that.

Snake:...Preferably without getting seen or noticed.

Knuckles: Oh....

Snake: So why are you here?

Tails: We're after a guy named Dr. Eggman.

Snake: Eggman? What the hell is an Eggman?

Sonic: He's an evil scientist. We chased him here.

Snake: Hmmmm...Fine.*Begins to walk away*

Tails: Where are you going?

Snake: I told you I was going to get inside, that's what I plan to do.

Sonic: You need back up? We can come with you...
11532111.title: ...walks up to them.

115321111.content:
For reasons Snake couldn't understand, he let them follow.

Snake: Alright, fine. Just stay close and try not to draw attention.

Sonic: You got it!

Snake walked over to the wall and removed one of the ventilation shafts as he began to crawl inside of it.

Knuckles: Do we really have to go through there?

Tails: Stop whining and let's go.

The four crawled through, following Snake until...
115321111.title: Snake allows them to tag along.

1153212.content:
Sonic: Where? I don't see anyone.

Tails: Wait. Look!

In a quick flash if electricity, it revealed someone in a orange and grey colored exoskeleton and helmet with a red glowing light on it. The being turned and looked at them, that's when Sonic and them noticed he had a sword.

Knuckles: Who are you?

Gray Fox:........
1153212.title: Gray Fox

11532121.content:
Gray Fox: Neither enemy, nor friend.

Sonic: What's that suppose to mean?

Gray Fox: I'm back from a world where such words are meaningless. I've removed all obstacles now you and I will battle to the death.

Tails: What do you want?

Gray Fox: I'll kill you or you'll kill me. It makes no difference.

Knuckles: Wait, what?

Gray Fox: Now, make me feel it! Make me feel alive again!
11532121.title: Neither Enemy, nor friend.

115321212.content: Then someone appear interupted Team Sonic & Gray Fox battle was.......
115321212.title: Other

1153212122.content: Right as Gray Fox readied to rush the three, a low tune hum was heard. Gray Fox, Sonic, Tails and Knuckles all began turning their heads to see where the noise was coming from. Gray Fox suddenly saw a blue, metallic object flying at him. Right before it reached him, he...
1153212122.title: Metal Sonic

1153221.content: Team Sonic appeared where in the MGS4 'verse?
1153221.title: Yes

choices: Yes! I wanna see Team Sonic kick some Ass on Lore with the Heroes!
Their games? sounded good but not to my tastes.
1153322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: Surprised that no one did this yet... How about one of the games from ArtixEntertainment?
1153322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Artix Entertainment

choices: ...A Middle-Aged Red-headed Man that was covered in Red Armor.(Sepulchure)
...A Man wearing a Futuristic-looking King's Garments.(Kingadent Slugworth)
1153322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
(If your gonna think why this is a prologue. It explains why Eggman goes to Lore before Team Sonic chases him and Metal into the portal. This takes place about 2-3 months after Lost World/Zeti Saga)


"Arrggg... CURSE THAT HEDGEHOG!!! First Dark Gaia betrayed me, then the Wisps returned to their homes leaving space, Next My Time Eater plan failed and left me stranded in that time loop, and now my Plans for the using Zeti and stealing the world's energy failed!" Eggman was his new Base and still furious about his recent loss to Sonic and Co. After being beaten for the 100th time by Sonic he wouldn't give that easily as usual... Orbot and Cubot were just floating there next to him before Orbot spoke up.
"Sir, perhaps you should lay low longer until you come up with another plan."
"Yarr! The slaliwag be right Capt'n! Ye should lay low until ye arr ready!'
"Your Voice Chip is stuck on Pirate again isn't it? Stop talking before The Doctor really loses it!"
"Arrgh! Ye arr Just jea--- *Gets slammed shut*"
"Annoying little cubed idoit..." Metal Sonic was the one that slammed down on Cubot to make him be quit.
"Hmph, I don't know why Eggman made you scrap-heaps in the first place."
"Grr... I made them when you betrayed me Gear for BRAINS! And don't think just because I rebuilt you doesn't mean you can do it again!"
"Hmph, Whatever... *walks away*"
"Disobedient little blue... Maybe I should use the Chaos Emeralds once again to take over the world and build My Empire Once More."
"If you insist Sir." Cubot undid himself form cube form.
"*voice chip back to normal* Huh? S-Sir the Communication mainframe is getting a Signal of Some Kind!"
"What? Metal GET BACK IN HERE NOW!!!" Metal Sonic comes back into the main room.
"What?"
"Cubot, Orbot what is the signal then?"
"Sir it appears to be..."
"What...?"
"Oh my, Its not of this world rather not of this Dimension!"
"How is that even---!!"
The Main Screen turns on and remains black as a mysterious voice speaks.
"Hello Dr. Robotnik or should I say Dr. Eggman..."
"Who are you, and how did you intercept this frequency!?"
"That is none of your concern for right now. But I have a preposition for you..."
"What kind of preposition?"
"One that is up to your standings in terms of... Evil and world Domination..."
"Hmm... I listening then..."
"I have been observing you for sometime now and I feel you take over the world with help."
"Go on."
"If we join forces I can be rid of this blue hedgehog that annoys you so."
"Get rid of Sonic and his two pesky friends?"
"Yes to Sonic and his team."
"Hehe.. You got your self a deal. But would be so kind as to show your form, tell me your name, and what your Plan is?
"Hmph" The Mysterious man Stepped out of the Shadows and revealed himself to be a...
1153322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: It begins...

1153322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The Stranger revealed himself to be a Middle-Aged Man around Eggman's Age that wore Blood-Red Full body armor and had red hair. When come into view a threatening red gleam came from his right that made Orbot and Cubot hide behind Eggman in fear, and made Metal Sonic and him be ready for anything.
"*sounds like Mephilies from 06* My name is Sepulchure my good Doctor, and what I ask of you is this. Have you heard of the Elemental Orbs?"
"Elemental Orbs... Yes I believe that I saw something about them in the Gaia-Manuscripts... The Elements are Fire, Light, Water, Earth, Wind, Energy, Ice, and Darkness and the ones who made them Are The 8 Elemental Avatars; while there names are Fiamme, Celerita, Neso, Tremblor. Khazri. Haeos, Kyanos, and Voidstar Correct?"
"You know them well then... I plan to use the orbs to make the Ultimatia Orb to grant my very wishes, and gather the avatars to make the energy unlimited. But inorder for you to help me and your empire... I require your realm's Chaos Emeralds and Master Emerald to make the portal to Lore."
"Interesting indeed, but what about Team Sonic?"
"Don't worry about them I send my apprentice to depose of them if they prove to hindering."
"Very well I will retrieve the Emeralds and make sure Sonic is dealt with."
Both began Laughing Manically as the wheel of Fate was set into motion for this new journey to begin.
*goes to story introduction*
1153322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: ...A Middle-Aged Red-headed Man that was covere...

choices: ...A clearing in the forest and finds a cliff (Sir Noob's Cliff)
..Smoke coming from the clearing and a familiar plane(The Tornado)
1153322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
After flying through the portal after Eggman Sonic and Co. were in a tunnel of what looked-like Gaia-like Essence flowing as a sheild of some kind. However its seems that it was unstable and shooting out of something more unstable and dangerous than Gaia.
"Tails, What is this place?"
"Sonic, This place may be apart of the Portal Eggman went there!"
"*Knuckles notices the walls of the Warpway*Is that... Gaia Force?No... It Couldn't be... could it?" Suddenly a bolt of unstable energy was charging up.
"Gahh! TAILS MOVE THE TORNADO NOW!!!"
"Knuckles, way would you want me to-- WAHH!!"
"Tails what's--? Woah!"
Tails moved the Tornado downard in time before the blast could hit them.
"What was that thing?!"
"Sonic, Tails listen to me! We need to get out here Now!"
"Knuckles we'll lose Eggman if we do!"
"Yeah. but isn't that just unstable Gaia- Ah!*notices what the radar said about the energy reading* Guys that isn't Gaia Force at all!"
"That's what I was trying to say! That energy is Mana Force!"
"Mana.., Force?"
"Guys I've lost Eggman off the radar, but something is close by! Really close!"
"*Notices a wall of energy* Tails, I think that Wall might be what the radar is picking up. I think we might be able to go around and find out where Eggman went t--" A small bolt of Mana Energy hit the tornado's engine.
All:"WoaH!""AHH!""NGHAH!"
"Oh no! The Engine!"
"Tails do Something!"
"Knuckles I wish could but that vortex is pulling us IN!"
"* Sonic notices another bolt coming" Guys, Brace yourselves!"
Everyone braced themselves when another bolt came and destroyed the part of the Tornado where Sonic was on.
"*Explosion* AAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!*Falls into the vortex*"
"SOONNIICC!!"
"SONIC!"
Tails and Knuckles went into the vortex as the tornado was pulled in by it, while leaving a glowing light behind as they vanished into it.
Sadly Team Sonic was seperated and plunged into an Alien World they have never seen before. In a near by forestry area somewhere a familiar blue hedgehog was waking up from his fall not to long ago.
"ugghhh... My head... huh? Tails Knuckles you guys There? Man that one blast... Come to think of it where am I?"
Sonic looks around to see...
1153322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The journey begins.

choices: ..Follow the Priestess and the Red Creature(Gorillaphent Attack!)
...Look for Tails and Knuckles in the Forest Expanse at the bottom of the Cliff
1153322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic dashes to the opening to a cliff looming over a massive forest expanse that spreaded towards a Mountain. He stared in disbelief and yet amazement when he this scenery.
"Ahaa... I know one thing... this isn't Blaze's World Nor Earth... It is Earth like, but where is here?"
Suddenly a strong gust of wind rushed past and made Sonic move forward abit. "RRRRAAAAGGGGHHHHHAAAAA!!!" He looked up to see a what made that roar and what he saw made him shocked; An actual living breathing dragon was what the roar came from. The Dragon was enormous in Size and was Red all over and looked like a normal cliche dragon. It landed in front of him and glared a bit.
"Uhh... Nice Dragon?"
"Raaarrrgghhhh!"
"HOAH! If this thing wants to fight I'll take it on! Once this is over see if I can find Tails and Knuckles next and find out where we are, then find old Baldy McNose-Hair and get back the Chaos Emeralds and Master Emerald."
Strangely it lowered its head to reveal to beings of this world. One was a Red Cat-Rabbit looking that was half as tall as Sonic, and Carried a staff with a leaf on it. The second person was a Middle-aged Human Woman that had long and banged silver hair, Ivory skin, and hazel eyes. She also wore a strange rode that made Sonic raise his Eyebrow. "Is this what Priests and Priestesses wear in this world?" He noticed she had a White Box with her that Dragon's head as a Emblem, and wore a necklace that similar to it. The Red creature walked onto the Dragon's head and gave a Friendly smile to Sonic.
"*sounds like chip only more girly* Hiyas! Priestess the way is clear nothing dangerous in sight. *walks towards Sonic*Excuse us sir."
"Huh? Oh, Sorry*steps out of the way*"
The priestess soon followed the creature, but stopped in front of Sonic giving an apologetic look on her face.
"I'm sorry if we startled you, but just don't mind us young Traveler we're only passing through."
"Huheha... No problem at all Ma'am."
"*growls* I really should just eat this Weird looking Kid, but that priestess said if I did. Things would be come bad in the future so I won't. *Flies Upward and takes off* See you soon you blue-spiky haired little punk!"
"Okay this just keeps getting weirder by the minute, but if I follow those two I could get some answers on to what this place is."
"Or I could go look for Tails and Knuckles then find those two again and get answers later."
Sonic decided to...
1153322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: ...A clearing in the forest and finds a cliff (...

1253322221.content:
We now start our story in a factory with a familiar two-tailed fox.

"Sonic? Knuckles? Anyone?"

Tails got up and surveyed the area.

"This place looks like it hasn't been used for a while. An elevator."

Tails got on and activated it.

When it got off, it was in a computer lab.

"Amazing. This place looks pretty amazing."

Then the elevator started moving.

"I gotta hide."

Tails then hid up in the wires.

Then in came
1253322221.title: code lyoko

12533222212.content:
"Its just a girl. Maybe I can sneak out before I'm noticed."

As Tails secretly backed out he accidently knocked down some wires which clattered.

"Is someone in here?" said Aelita as she heard the noise.

Tails silently as he crept out into the elevator until he was spotted.

"Hey!"

"Wha! Please don't hurt me."

"What a strange creature. Two tails? It can even speak. What's your name?"

"Miles Prowler. But everyone just calls me Tails. I'm looking for my friends."

"Well, I did see some footprints heading toward
12533222212.title: aelita

14.content: Here in else, you have the option of crossing this team over with three of my favorite stories. Now which story will you select?
14.title: else

info.brief_description: Sonic the hedgehog and pals crossover into different genres.
info.description:
Our favorite hedgehog Sonic is turning twenty, so I created this and the four other interactives for the occasion.

Team Sonic is crossing over into other forms of media.

The main characters are sonic the hedgehog(speed), Miles"Tails"Prowler(flight), and Knuckles the echidna(power). And the villains are dr.eggman and metal sonic.

rules
no killing, unless it is a villain except dr. eggman
no sex
no gore, but you can mention blood

that is all
